data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the state of Vega Alta prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Vega Alta, Puerto Rico
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of Vega Alta. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.section_summary: On average, 3 babies will be born in the next week to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Vega Alta, Puerto Rico.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, teach the children in the state of Vega Alta to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.
Jesus, teach the local leaders in Vega Alta, Puerto Rico to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Brenas
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Brenas, Vega Alta, Puerto Rico.
Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Vega Alta to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who are far from you in Vega Alta. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Vega Alta hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."
